channel.title: GTorvaPkz - Release V1!
channel.description:
Hello there .. this is my first release ... so please comment a nice comment .. im sure there will alot problems .. please report it ! so here is it --
GTorvaPkz - Release V1 THE BEST SERVER EVER PKING & ECONOMY
* - *All Special attacks & animations works ! * - *All bosses works ! * - *Great Shops * - *Donator shops , And staffzone shops ! * - *Alot commands ! * - *Easy XP Rating * - *Donator Zone with awesome benifits * - *Dragon claws and ags is stronger ! * - *Scythe 100% Animation * - *Sled 100% Animation * - *WORKING EASTER EGG ALL 5 EGGS !!(item 7927) * - *Shadow sword Special attack 100% * - *Benifits to donators * - *Easy Money making : * - *Red topez , Runite ore, Magic logs are 320k Each. * - *Dragon token is exchange to money - 1B Each * - *Costum Home * - *Praying zone at home * - *Skills & Trades at home togther ! * - *Train zone at home !! * - *::Dparty (drop partys place) * - *::Bz Bank zone * - *::dz Dice zone * - *Primal , korasi , Sol and all spirits shields !! * - *Torva and spirits shields non-donors ! * - *Great Pk shop * - *New Crystal Keys reward! * - *Fixed Pkp when your die !! * - *Awesome Start Package * - *New Costum Home with shops | Skilling | Trades | Dark Beast | Hill giant | Begginer Train zone * - *Virtus - 13346 , 13348 , 13350 | Pernix - 13352 , 13354 , 13355 | Torva - 13358 , 13360 ,13362. * - - - Here some pictures - - - *
[IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/29/8700313_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/29/8700314_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/29/8700315_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/29/8700316_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/34/8700321_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/33/8700320_bigthumb.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/32/8700318_bigthumb.png[/img][IMG]http://www.picamatic.com/show/2012/09/28/02/30/8700317_bigthumb.png[/img]
All bosses Works 100% !! To use corp please use ::corp
More pictures will add soon ... Thanks for viewing and im very hope you will use it !:blush: You also can replace here Pictures of it and i will upload ! Download Link (PACKAGE) File is 78.53MB
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?kzf5ltubzznbx33]Download GTorvaPkz NOW (Package source + Client) !![/url] PLEASE CHANGE IP OF CLIENT SO YOU CAN USE CLIENT !
Credits: Client 100% Impozzes .. Source 80% Me (Zamorak) 2% Saradomin (cms sh4nk3d , helped find home :D ) 15% Alex for coding commands and start messages(PvPscapez) 1% Venom for give idea of release , Thanks bro !

item.title: GTorvaPkz - Release V1!
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

danz270:

How do I change ip? :s

Search client sided for ‘client.java’
Open it and hit ctrl-f search for ‘server =’ change it into 127.0.0.1
